departmentName.description: The name of the department or category associated with the search term.

searchTerm.description: The specific term or keyword entered by users in search queries.

searchFrequencyRank.description: The ranking of this search term based on its frequency of occurrence in search queries.

clickedAsin.description: The ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number) that was clicked for this search term.

clickShareRank.description: The ranking of this search term based on the click share it received.

clickShare.description: The share of total clicks that this search term received out of all the clicks in the report period.

conversionShare.description: The share of total conversions attributed to this search term out of all conversions in the report period.

dataEndTime.description: The end time of the data collection period for this report.

queryEndDate.description: The end date of the search term query.
